features: Our spiral notebooks come in an exclusive new palette of citrusy pastels to pretty up your school day or work routine; practical & cute notebook set; 3 hole punched & college ruled; 70 sheets; 6 pack

Gel pens & highlighters welcome; each notebook contains 70 sheets of smooth double sided paper that resists ink smearing & bleed through for pinworthy, A plus notes; a snag-free coil holds it all together
The right ruling; these 8" x 10-1/2" college ruled notebooks fit more writing per page than wide ruled; gives you 70 double sided sheets (7-1/2" x 10-1/2" detached) 3 hole punched to fit your binder
Perfed just right; Oxford micro perforated sheets are designed so the notes you want stay and the notes you don't detach cleanly; no loose sheets or mishaps like with bargain notebook brands
Quality at the right price; bulk 6 packs are an economical choice for classroom, home school or work; stand out & color code by subject or child in pastel pink, orange, yellow, green, blue & purple
Notebook covers are made of premium coated paperboard.
body.description: These Oxford Spiral Notebooks are dressed in our exclusive new pastel colors; a citrusy collection that's a must-add to your cute school supplies list. Brighten up and tidy up their notetaking routine with pastel notebooks that are practical as well as pretty. Each is 3 hole punched to fit a standard binder. A sturdy snag resistant coil resists catching on backpacks or clothing. Micro perforated sheets hold notes firmly, yet still detach easily to keep your spiral notebook neat and tidy. Expand your color options for the classroom, home office or home school. This bright new mix of colors will appeal to students of all ages, from pre-school to grade school to high school and beyond. 8" x 10-1/2" overall. 7 1/2" x 10-1/2" Detached sheets. 70 sheets of double sided, college rule paper. 6 Pack in pastel pink, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple. Covers are made of coated paperboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Functional
reviews.reviewText: Loved these so much I ordered the same set again for this semester! Nothing fancy, just cute, colored notebooks for a good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack is a game-changer! With its vibrant and pastel colors of pink, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple, it instantly caught my eye. As someone who loves stationery, I couldn't resist picking these up.The quality of the paper is exceptional. It's college-ruled, providing ample space for note-taking or doodling. Each notebook contains 70 sheets, which is perfect for a single subject. I was pleasantly surprised by how sturdy the spiral binding is; it keeps all the pages neatly intact.My kids absolutely adore these notebooks. The colorful covers make studying more enjoyable for them, and they each have their favorite color. Whether it's for schoolwork or personal use, these notebooks have become a staple in our home. Plus, having a variety of colors means there's always one to suit their mood or style.In summary, the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack has been a hit in our household. Its durability, vibrant colors, and ample pages have made it a must-have for both kids and adults. It's a simple yet effective way to add a touch of joy to your everyday note-taking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute - Thin - Light
reviews.reviewText: Easy to take everywhere, cute, clean, easy to write on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really great value on some standard notebooks! I will be using these as a college student, and they seem up to the task of bouncing around in my backpack.Paper is good enough quality. Not too thick, but it fares well with minimal bleed through. I did a bleed-through test; highlighters and gel pens don't bleed too badly. Permanent marker bleeds as it always will, but my brush pen with liquid ink did ok! I think this paper will stand up to a fountain pen if you aren't a heavy-handed person.I will be buying these again when I need more! Can't really beat the price and quality.

reviews.reviewText: I loved this the notebooks were so high quality and the colors also looked so good. I cant wait to use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Bang for your buck, sturdy and reliable notebook
reviews.reviewText: I was thrilled to try out the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack, and I must say that I am beyond impressed with this product. Here is my detailed review of the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack.Design and Quality:The Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack has a beautiful and modern design, with pastel pink, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple colors that are perfect for anyone who loves vibrant hues. The spiral binding is strong and sturdy, ensuring that the pages do not come loose, even with regular use. The covers are made from a thick cardstock material that is durable, protecting the pages from damage.Paper Quality:The paper quality is outstanding, and the college-ruled lines are spaced perfectly, making it easy to write notes and keep everything neat and organized. The pages are thick and of high quality, ensuring that ink does not bleed through. The paper is also acid-free, making it perfect for long-term storage of important notes and documents.Size and Portability:The size of the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack is perfect for carrying around, measuring at 8 x 10-1/2 inches. The pages are also perforated, making it easy to tear out notes and share them with others. The notebooks are lightweight and easy to carry in a backpack or purse, making them ideal for students and professionals who are always on the go.Value for Money:The Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack offers excellent value for money, with six high-quality notebooks included in one pack. The notebooks are affordable, making them perfect for students who need to purchase multiple notebooks for the school year. The durability of the notebooks also means that they can be used for a long time, making them a wise investment.Overall, I highly recommend the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack to anyone who needs a reliable and high-quality notebook for their writing and note-taking needs. The design, paper quality, size, and portability are all exceptional, making these notebooks an excellent investment. Whether you are a student, professional, or simply someone who loves to write, these notebooks will not disappoint.
